newsitem.title: USA: Cirrus Logic to raise $175 mln.
newsitem.headline: Cirrus Logic to raise $175 mln.

text.p: Cirrus Logic Inc Wednesday said it intends, subject to market and other conditions, to raise up to $175 million through a private placement of convertible subordinated notes to qualified institutional investors and off-shore investors.

In a statement, the company said the purposes of the offering are principally to repay debt, for general working capital purposes and for expenditures associated with the company's investments in manufacturing.
Cirrus said the notes will be convertible into common stock and will have a seven-year term. No other terms were disclosed.
